description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc 

Are you a new instructor or a veteran instructor with little success? 

Are you Stuck with What you Should teach on Udemy?

Are you Confused with which Microphone, Software or Hardware you should buy at a minimum to kick of your online teaching career?

It can be a stressful experience getting ready to make your first course. With so many questions that need to answer and new skills that need to learnt. 

Udemy is one of the world's largest marketplaces with over 10 million students that are hungry and waiting for your skills! But it can seem so daunting to create your first course! 

This is where this course comes in! You will learn everything that I wish I know when I started teaching on Udemy from how to get Udemy to take some of the load off your shoulders up to how to make bad audio sound acceptable!

I can not wait to see you in the course!
title: Kick Off Your Udemy Instructor Career - Unofficial
